Sounds good to me. I believe you said that you had something to finish with=

Celeron, is there anything any of us can do to help with that?

Preston.

<div>Sounds good to me. I believe you said that you had something to finish=
 with Celeron, is there anything any of us can do to help with that?</div>

<div class=3D"gmail_quote">On Fr=

<div>
<p>
<p>I did a rough update to the summ=
ary and setting section of the wiki.=A0 I haven't updated any of he sub=
 pages but I eventually will.=A0 As for many of the inactive characters, I&=
#39;m thinking of either creating a separate list or moving them off to the=
 continuum characters list so we can more or less have a list of currently =
active characters.</p>

<p>The maximals have more or less consolidated.=A0 =
We have a small group of Bushido Predecons that were active, the other grou=
p Iron Skulls, haven't really done anything.=A0 I was thinking they mig=
ht both align with Hydras, but then again the Bushido's sense of honor =
might make them reluctant to follow him.=A0 The watchers can continue as th=
ey are, since they've always been background characters; right now they=
're keeping an eye on the Ark.</p>

<p>-Kraftlos<br></p><br><br>
<p></p=
>

<div class=3D"im">On Feb 25, 2010 9:39 AM, &qu=
ot;supercyclonus" <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@..." targe=
t=3D"_blank">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br>Hello,<br>=A0 =

but I have been sporatically reading some of the posts I have missed.<br>
<=
br>My core characters would be: Cyclonus & Scourge, Marauder, Legacy. I=
 am also keeping Rodimus for the moment to work out a few things with Airly=
.<br><br>I am also utilizing other characters that I was temping before I l=
eft such as: Lord Elder, and Zarak/Skorponok to keep some plot elements run=
ning, but they may fade back into the backround as things quiet a little. A=
nd of course there were the minions I left in NPC status and Myrmidon who i=
s in the background.<br>
<br>You will probrably note that as time goes alon=
g some of these other characters I play will fade into and out of the backr=
ound, and I will only be playing a few at a time as people need RP partners=
 or events unfold. For example, Legacy tends to stay at the Ark for the mos=
t part, and will eventually return there unless something happens to change=
 that.<br>
<br>If anyone wants to run one of the minions NPC's or any o=
f the characters I am temping, they are more than welcome, so long as they =
let me know first :)<br><br>And for the record, I am all for consolidation =
of the factions for the moment. Perhaps Hydras could have userped control o=
f the Bushido Predacons and such, and others, while the other Maximal clans=
 come together under one banner?? Food for thought! :)<br>
<br>Anyways, gam=
e on!<br><br>Preston<br></div>
